    • Constructor Detail

      • TemporalSlotConfiguration

        public TemporalSlotConfiguration(java.lang.String customId,
                                 java.lang.String adUnit,
                                 double timePosition)
        Create a temporal slot configuration for the ad request
        Parameters:
        customId - custom ID of the slot. If slot with the same custom ID already exists, the invocation will be ignored.
        timePosition - time position of the slot
        adUnit - ad unit of the ads allowed to be delivered into the slot, which can be one of the predefined ad units listed as follows or a custom ad unit defined in MRM.
        ADUNIT_PREROLL
        ADUNIT_MIDROLL
        ADUNIT_POSTROLL
        ADUNIT_OVERLAY
        ADUNIT_PAUSE_MIDROLL
        ADUNIT_STREAM_PREROLL (live mode only)
        ADUNIT_STREAM_POSTROLL (live mode only)

        Get the sequence number of the cue point the slot is at.

      • setCuePointSequence

        public void setCuePointSequence(int cuePointSequence)
        Set the sequence number of the cue point the slot is at.
        Parameters:
        cuePointSequence - sequence number of the cue point the slot is at.

      • getMaxDuration

        public double getMaxDuration()
        Get the maximum duration of the temporal slot.
        Returns:
        maximum duration of the slot allowed. 0 by default which will be treated by ad server as unlimited.

      • setMaxDuration

        public void setMaxDuration(double maxDuration)
        Set maximum duration of the temporal slot.
        Parameters:
        maxDuration - maximum duration of the slot allowed. 0 by default which will be treated by ad server as unlimited.

      • getMinDuration

        public double getMinDuration()
        Get the minimum duration of the temporal slot.
        Returns:
        minimum duration of the slot allowed.(0 by default)

      • setMinDuration

        public void setMinDuration(double minDuration)
        Set the minimum duration of the temporal slot.

        Returns:

        Parameters:
        timePosition - time position of the slot
